FuncDef:
The undo pnp default route command deletes a PNP route.
By default, no PNP route is created.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a VPN instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. In addition, the VPN instance name must not be _public_. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

Examples: [~HUAWEI] undo pnp default route vpn-instance vrf1
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To create a PNP route, run the pnp default route command. When the PNP function is not required, run the undo pnp default route command to delete the default PNP route.During ZTP, a device automatically generates PnP routes. After the device restarts, the configuration is downloaded. After the ZTP process ends, the device restarts. Before the restart, the device automatically deletes the PnP routes.
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
